resources.string: \t\t\tMulti Motor Allocation lets you customise the motion of the system. Select one of the templates or Customize your own profile to continue.

\t\t\tDue to the differences of Motor Allocations, we need to know which motors need to be turned on in which motions. Here are the movements you\'re required to configure. Click EXPORT button when you\'re done.
\t\tWelcome to Make-ROV Setup Wizard. In this wizard, you\'re required to fill in every item below. Items can be modified anytime. Your ROV Should work after the wizard.
\t\tIn this page, you will need to fill some basic informations about your ROV. Fill in the items below.
\t\tIn this page, you\'ll need to fill in every information for individual sensors. Choose the sensor you want to initialize from the spinner below.
